data.name: RatName
data.value: Wererat

data.name: RatDescription
data.value: Imbecile pest. Nothing to worry about...

data.name: BatName
data.value: Giant Bat

data.name: BatDescription
data.value: Fast beast. 15% chance to dodge your attacks.

data.name: LeechName
data.value: Phlegmy Leech

data.name: LeechDescription
data.value: Bloodsucker vermin. Deals +1 damage when you have more than 50% of your maximum health.

data.name: CrabName
data.value: Mutant Crab

data.name: CrabDescription
data.value: A real abnormality. 20% chance to interrupt your attacks in a fight.

data.name: ToadName
data.value: Poison Toad

data.name: ToadDescription
data.value: Venomous creature. 10% chance to poison you with hallucinogens on hit.

data.name: GoatmanName
data.value: Goatman

data.name: GoatmanDescription
data.value: Evil fiend. 15% chance to leave a critical wound when hitting you.

data.name: BoarName
data.value: Orcish Boar

data.name: BoarDescription
data.value: Clumsy brute. 10% chance to interrupt your attacks, but has a 20% chance to miss a hit.

data.name: BugbearName
data.value: Bugbear

data.name: BugbearDescription
data.value: Living horror. When it attacks you, its eyes may leave you trembling in fear (10% chance).

data.name: SkeletonName
data.value: Skeleton

data.name: SkeletonDescription
data.value: Animated undead. There's a 50% chance that it will reanimate once after death.

data.name: ZombieName
data.value: Zombie

data.name: ZombieDescription
data.value: Undead miscreation. When damaged it may regenerate its wounds (35% chance) healing for 5 points.

data.name: VampireName
data.value: Vampire

data.name: VampireDescription
data.value: Undead prince. May feast on your blood (50% chance) stealing 5 health points.

data.name: RevenantName
data.value: Revenant

data.name: RevenantDescription
data.value: Undead overlord. 50% chance to summon a Skeleton when hit. 7% chance to scare you to death.

data.name: MummyName
data.value: Mummy

data.name: MummyDescription
data.value: Misfortunate undead. When killed its curse will befall on you damaging 3 points.

data.name: GolemName
data.value: Scrap Golem

data.name: GolemDescription
data.value: Sturdy behemoth. Immune to fear and interrupts. Has 50% chance to reduce damage suffered by 3.

data.name: ElementalName
data.value: Crystal Elemental

data.name: ElementalDescription
data.value: Chilling colossus. Each hit on its shard covered body damages you for 2 points.

data.name: TenguName
data.value: Tengu

data.name: TenguDescription
data.value: Demonic avian. 25% chance to strike twice in a battle and 5% chance to interrupt your attacks.

data.name: BossName
data.value: Buzzard Wizard

data.name: BossDescription
data.value: Avian being of unknown origin. May possess any powerful magic known to man.

data.name: ShopKeeperName
data.value: The Shopkeeper

data.name: ShopKeeperDescription
data.value: Who knows what powers it has at its disposal. It is better to not get in a fight...
